recordingmedia: Internal Memory: Approx. 8MB SD/SDHC Card (Up to 32GB Support) [MMC Card not supported]
exposuremeteringmethod: Artificial Intelligence AE (AiAE), Center-Weighted Average, Spot (Fixed to Center of Frame), Face AE
movie: Movie Format: MOV (Motion JPEG), Audio: G.711 [Monaural]
shootingrange: (Wide) Approx. 0.3 m a?" 3.9 m (ISO800); (Tele) Approx. 1.2 m a?" 2.4 m (ISO800)
playbackmodes: Single Photo, Index (9/16 Thumbnails) Slide Show, Zoom (Approx. x2 - x8)
dimensionswxhxd: 3.60 x 2.23 x 0.90 in. / 91.5 x 56.5 x 22.9 mm (Based on CIPA Standards)
power: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LB-012, 3.7V 700mAh, In-Camera Charging  Shooting
whitebalancecontrol: Auto (AWB), Daylight, Cloudy, Flourescent, Flourescent CWF, Incandescent, Manual
otherfeatures: PictBridge, ExifPrint Support, Multi-Language Support (27 Languages)
shootingmodes: M, Auto, Image Stabilization, Portrait, Movie, Panorama, Scene (ASCN, Landscape, Sport, Beach, Sunset, Fireworks, Night Landscape,  Snow, Children, ID, Glass, Photo Frame, Panning Shot, Text, Fish Eye, Party, Indoor, Leaf, Museum, Night Portrait, Sketch)
flashmodes: Auto, Red-Eye Reduction, Forced Flash, No Flash, Slow Synchro, Red-Eye Reduction + Slow Synchro
